title: Logging In after Sign-up
body:
Hey, 
Hope this is the right spot to ask this. I just signed up to play the game but it keeps saying my login and pass are incorrect and I can't get into the game from client. I just had to login to write this so I know it's not me messing up my username/pass.

I reset my browser,
Changes the preferences for cookies,
unlocked my time zone,
restart computer,
checked if server was online,
checked my region PBE> North America

All Checked out. It just won't let me log in.


Thanks

replies.body: The live client should not have an option for the PBE.  The PBE is a stand alone client, so you may actually be trying to login from the wrong patcher.  As a first step, make sure that you've downloaded the live client which can be found [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  Let me know if you still have any issues.
